entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
